name: Ninja Slice'Em Off HD Game Free
name_original: Ninja Slice'Em Off HD Game Free
description:
Ninja Slice Em Off, is an surreal experience of a game!

A small tribute to all the annoying creatures that we cannot control out there. These funny faces are just plain annoying, they move around and knock you off. Well.. Knock them back and put them in their place and Slice'Em Off in true Ninja style. There is only one rule - Remain Calm!!

In this game you move the faces to their appropriate corner to complete every stage. As the stages progresses it gets more annoying.

Try this old, annoying, little, funny game today to unwind after a challenging day of annoying faces!!

Ninja Slice'Em oFF!
